attributes.action: GIVE POLICE THE POWER TO SUSPEND DRIVING LICENCES WHEN SOMEONE IS ON BAIL
attributes.additional_details:
I WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO GIVE THE POLICE THE POWER TO SUSPEND DRIVING LICENCES WHEN A DRIVER HAS BEEN CHARGED WITH AN OFFENCE
ie CAUSING DEATH BY DANGEROUS DRIVING AND CAUSING SERIOUS INJURY BY DANGEROUS DRIVING
I BELIEVE IF YOU HAVE BEEN CHARGED WITH AN OFFENCE YOU SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED TO DRIVE TILL AFTER YOU HAVE BEEN TO COURT
